debug-entity-empty: [gardenerz] player entity is empty on join
itemdesc-gardening-bag: Can store all items related to plants, seeds or crops.
itemdesc-gardening-bag-sturdy: Can store more items related to plants, seeds or crops then the gardening bag.
itemdesc-bigger-gardening-bag: Can store more items related to plants, seeds or crops then the sturdy gardening bag.
itemdesc-industrial-fertilizer: High quality fertiliser for the garden.
